messages.content:
Here is a refined answer based only on the provided context:

To take a backup of alert definitions, follow these steps:

1. Go to Admin > Config > Alerts > Manage Alert Definitions.
2. Select the folder which contains alert definitions that you want to backup and click Export Selected Definitions. To take a backup of all available alerts, select Alert definitions and then click Export All Definitions.

Note: If the customization is done using only threshold values, then back-up of alert definitions is not required as threshold values are retained after upgrade.
 
Steps applicable for versions SRM 4.3.x and later:

1. Go to Alerting Frontend UI.
2. Under Local Manager, click Alert Definitions.

If you need to export the alerting-contexts.xml file, please refer to the directory locations mentioned in section [Step 3] of the context (versions earlier than SRM 4.3) or follow the steps in version SRM 4.3.x and later.
